level_description (from recommendations_: Drink at least 6 cups (about 1.5 liters) of water per day on at least 2 days per week
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Adequate hydration supports energy, metabolism, brain function, and healthy skin. Drinking enough water daily can improve mood, cognition, and overall well-being.
formula: average of top 2 daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Drink at least 8 cups (about 2 liters) of water per day on at least 5 days per week
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Adequate hydration supports energy, metabolism, brain function, and healthy skin. Drinking enough water daily can improve mood, cognition, and overall well-being.
formula: average of top 5 daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Make at least 2 meals per day whole-food meals, at least 5 days per week
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Emphasizing whole, minimally processed foods at meals supports metabolic health, lowers inflammation, and improves gut health and satiety.
formula: average of top 5 daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Reach at least 5,000 steps per day on at least 2 days per week
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Daily step count is a simple, powerful marker of physical activity and metabolic health. Increasing steps improves cardiovascular, cognitive, and overall health.
formula: average of top 2 daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Reach at least 7,500 steps per day on at least 5 days per week
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Daily step count is a simple, powerful marker of physical activity and metabolic health. Increasing steps improves cardiovascular, cognitive, and overall health.
formula: average of top 5 daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Start moving: Achieve at least 60 minutes of daily active time on 5+ days per week
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Building more daily movement boosts mood, metabolism, heart health, and helps maintain a healthy weight. Active time is a core pillar of physical and mental resilience.
formula: average of top N daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Increase your movement: Reach at least 90 minutes of daily active time on 5+ days per week
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Building more daily movement boosts mood, metabolism, heart health, and helps maintain a healthy weight. Active time is a core pillar of physical and mental resilience.
formula: average of top N daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Break up sitting: Limit sedentary time to under 8 hours daily (5+ days/week)
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Reducing prolonged sitting lowers cardiometabolic and cognitive risk, improves posture, and supports more sustained energy throughout the day.
formula: average of top N daily scores that meet minimum threshold

level_description (from recommendations_: Sit less: Limit sedentary time to under 7 hours daily (6+ days/week)
Overview (from recommendations_v2): Reducing prolonged sitting lowers cardiometabolic and cognitive risk, improves posture, and supports more sustained energy throughout the day.
formula: average of top N daily scores that meet minimum threshold
